headline: Waste Management, Inc. (WM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Waste Management, Inc. on Global Equity Briefing’s Substack by Ray Myers. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on WM. Waste Management, Inc.’s share was trading at $228.58 as of June 25th. WM’s trailing and forward P/E were 34.42 and 29.76 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Waste Management […]
